name: GKMatchmakingMode
desc: Possible modes that a multiplayer game uses to find matches.

items.name: case nearbyOnly
items.desc: A mode that matches the local player only with nearby players.

items.name: case automatchOnly
items.desc: A mode that matches the local player only with players who are also actively looking for a match.

items.name: case inviteOnly
items.desc: A mode that matches the local player only with players who they invite, and doesnâ€™t use automatch to fill empty slots.
